summary: Don Paolo, a young parson troubled by his love for Agnese, tries to make peace in a little village in Sardinia where two families are at war.
cast: Mel Ferrer|Amedeo Nazzari|Lea Massari|Henri Vilbert|Germaine Kerjean|Eduardo Ciannelli|Decimo Cristiani|Paolo Ferrara|Mario Guglielmi|Ornella Spegni|Giulio Battiferri|Antonio Gradoli|Renato Terra|Aldo Pini|Mimmo Palmara|Armando Guarnieri|Orazio Costa|Giuseppe Chinnici|Manlio Busoni|Memmo Luisi
title: Proibito
